## Shuffling data (splitting into training and validation)

```{r}
set.seed(42)
trainIndex <- createDataPartition(data$Marker, p=0.7, list=FALSE, times=1)
trainData <- data[trainIndex,]
testData <- data[-trainIndex,]
```
